function noisy(f) {   
    	return function(arg) {     
    		console.log(""calling with"", arg);     
    		var val = f(arg);     
    		console.log(""called with"", arg, ""- got"", val);     
    		return val;   }; 
    } 
    noisy(Boolean)(0); 
    // <U+2192> calling with 0 
    // <U+2192> called with 0 - got false
